item.description:
With autumn here, I am in the mood for some good ol' comfort food. I know we've gone here before but I feel the need for something familiar. We'll eat dinner at 7pm and then stay for karaoke. If you can only make it to karaoke, please don't RSVP...just show up and we'll make room for you! :)
I am going to call ahead and reserve a table for us so please keep that in mind when submitting your RSVP. I am also cross-listing this event with Gals Just Wanna Have Fun.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Italian Food at Marco Polo
